pages.text: If you've ever finished building something only to discover it's one block off where you wanted it to be or facing the wrong way, you'll understand the value of a tool that let's you copy and paste large areas.$(br2)Use $(k:settings_menu) to switch between $(thing)Copy Mode$() and $(thing)Paste Mode$() (details over page). $(br)Can Undo one action.

pages.title: Modes/Settings
pages.text: $(l)Copy:$() Right-Click a block to select the first corner of the area to be copied, then Shift-Right-Click the opposite corner to define it.$(br)$(l)Paste:$() Use to place the copied structure (as long as you have the necessary blocks in your inventory. Will not replace blocks, so clear the area first.$(br)$(l)Edit Placement:$() Can also access with Shift-Right-Click in the air. Allows editing and clearing the area being copied

(Copy Mode) and moving the preview around (Paste Mode).$(br)$(l)Anchor:$() Toggle to hold the preview in place, allowing you to move around and check before finalizing the exchange.$(br)$(l)Raytrace Fluid:$() Toggle on to treat fluids as targetable for placing against in Paste Mode.$(br)$(l)Rotate:$() Rotates the preview around the vertical axis in Paste Mode.$(br)$(l)Mirror:$() Flips the preview Left to Right in front of the player.
